have half a mind to do something.word: have half a mind to do something
have half a mind to do something.transla: used to say that you would like to do something but you probably will not do it
He had half a mind to ask for his money back.
I have half a mind to tell your mother about this.
used to say that you might do something to show that you disapprove of something someone has done
I’ve a good mind to tell him exactly what I think.
I’ve half a mind to stop him seeing her altogether.
used to say that you may decide to do something
I’ve half a mind to come with you tomorrow.
